name: Django-Music-Publisher
description: Metadata management for original music publishers

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key, used for security, let it be autogenerated.

PUBLISHER_NAME.description: The name of your publishing entity. Do NOT use coma in the name!

PUBLISHER_CODE.description: The code required for CWR delivery, get it from your society. Without it, CWR export will not work.

PUBLISHER_IPI_NAME.description: Publisher IPI name number, get it from your society.

PUBLISHER_IPI_BASE.description: Publisher IPI base number. Rarely used.

PUBLISHER_PR_SOCIETY.description: Numerical performance society code, ask your society for the value. Do not enter leading zeros.

PUBLISHER_MR_SOCIETY.description: Numerical mechanical society code, ask your society for the value. Do not enter leading zeros.

PUBLISHER_SR_SOCIETY.description: Numerical synchronization society code, rarely used

ENFORCE_SAAN.description: Make society-assigned original agreement number required. Required in some societies, e.g. PRS.

ENFORCE_PUBLISHER_FEE.description: Make publisher fee required. If unsure, leave the default.
